name: Drunken Kaiju
description:
In Drunken Kaiju, you are exactly as the title suggests, a kaiju named Jimothy that had consumed a little too much radiation before his shift working for the Destructive Kaiju Company. Unfortunately, Jimothy hasn't been the best employee as of late and consistently drinks on the job too. Can you destroy the city despite Jimothy being under the influence?

Unique "Drunken" Movements: 

- Fling yourself across the city with Jimothy’s drunken dives! 

- Jimothy moves with the stagger and silliness of your average drunkard! 

- As with anyone who's had too much to drink, Jimothy may puke, although he is a bit more potent

 Fully Destructible Environment: 

 - A city environment for you to destroy with all the flamboyant style of a giant drunken lizard!

- Throw objects in the hopes of causing chain reactions to rock the block!

- You are on the clock, the more you get done, the more your boss will reward you with higher ranks and greater pay! 

 Gameplay Powerups: 

- Find clocks around the map to add overtime pay onto your shift!

- Drink from bottles of radiation to upset your monster's stomach!
